articles.title: Facebook is asking to use Meta AI on photos in your camera roll you haven’t yet shared - TechCrunch
articles.description: By clicking "Allow," you'll let Facebook generate new ideas from your camera roll, like collages, recaps, AI restylings, or photo themes.
articles.content:
Facebook is asking users for access to their phone’s camera roll to automatically suggest AI-edited versions of their photos — including ones that haven’t been uploaded to Facebook yet.
